name: Eye of the Sword
description:
My first attempt at first person melee combat.

Originally I believed that you couldn't do good first person melee combat, and when I came to the idea that it wasn't impossible, I tried it, failed, and discovered that it's unusually difficult. Much harder than first person ranged combat, for example.

  • mouse + wasd
  • left click to attack
  • spacebar to jump
  • escape to close
